description: Satou Jun is one of the cooks at Wagnaria. He is usually silent but can be very blunt when he is forced to speak. He has an unrequited love for Todoroki Yachiyo, and is frustrated by the fact that she seems to be warming up to him but will not let go of her obsession with Shirafuji Kyouko. He is also a heavy smoker.
name: Satou Jun
